name: Neuvillette
desc:
"Ordainer of Inexorable Judgment" Neuvillette

He who looks down on all that are haughty.

customize.name: Neuvillette
customize.desc:
"Ordainer of Inexorable Judgment" Neuvillette

He who looks down on all that are haughty.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Thank you for your invitation. I hope that you will enjoy this game."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Neuvillette's deck utilizes large numbers of effects related to HP changes, along with Companion Cards which can increase his resource advantage, before using the Character Card "Neuvillette" to unleash powerful attacks.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.desc:

He who looks down on all that are haughty.

customize.name: Baizhu
customize.desc:

Living with many maladies, where will one find a cure?

customize.name: Yae Miko
customize.desc:

The wise and beautiful Yae Miko.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> , creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Sourcewater Droplet</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Sourcewater Droplet</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After Neuvillette uses a Normal Attack:</color> Heals the character for 2 HP. After this, <color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> : <color=#ffffff>Equitable Judgment</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s</color> <color=#ffffff>): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)
<color=#ece5d8>Equitable Judgment</color>
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> . If this character has at least 6 HP, then this DMG is increased by 1 and this character deals 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to himself.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> , deals 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters on standby, then creates a <color=#ffffff>Sourcewater Droplet</color> with 2 Usages.
<color=#ece5d8>Sourcewater Droplet</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After Neuvillette uses a Normal Attack:</color> Heals the character for 2 HP. After this, <color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> : <color=#ffffff>Equitable Judgment</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)
<color=#ece5d8>Equitable Judgment</color>
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> . If this character has at least 6 HP, then this DMG is increased by 1 and this character deals 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to himself.

Applies Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>] Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Prepare Skill</color>
Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.
When it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> , the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)
Only active characters can <color=#ffffff>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#ffffff>preparation</color> will be interrupted.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Piercing DMG</color>
Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

value.name: Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority
value.desc:
Neuvillette: Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority

"The tides beckon."

value.text: Reward for inviting Neuvillette to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

value.name: Neuvillette
value.desc: The Chief Justice of Fontaine, known as the Iudex, is renowned for his unassailable impartiality.

imgDesc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
O Tides, I Have Returned
